tool_description: The Image Recognition API allows you to integrate our cloud image recognition into your applications and services.
name: Catchoom Image Recognition
title: Catchoom Image Recognition

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: It allows sending visual recognition requests from client applications (such as mobile apps or your own server).

required_parameters.name: image
required_parameters.description: the query image, as binary image file in jpeg or png (without transparency) format.

required_parameters.name: token
required_parameters.description: the Token of the collection to be searched.  Please refer to http://catchoom.com/documentation/token/
